scripts.postgenerate-favicon:
for file in assets/images/favicon/browserconfig.xml assets/images/favicon/site.webmanifest; do perl -pi -e 'print "---
---

" if $. == 1' "$file"; done
scripts.postinject-favicon: for file in _includes/favicon.html; do perl -pi -e 's/<\/?(html|head|body)>\n?//g' "$file"; done
scripts.linkify-favicon: for file in assets/images/favicon/browserconfig.xml assets/images/favicon/site.webmanifest _includes/favicon.html; do perl -pi -e 's/\/assets\/.+(?=\?v=\d+)/{% link $& %}/g' "$file"; done
scripts.postlinkify-favicon: for file in _includes/favicon.html; do perl -pi -e 's/\/(?=assets\/.+(site\.webmanifest|browserconfig\.xml))//g' "$file"; done
scripts.update-favicon: npm run generate-favicon && npm run inject-favicon && npm run linkify-favicon
